Easy storage for manual in the seat itself though.

No re-threading which is great, cup holders tend to come up pretty easy, might have to glue them into place or something. Overall a great seat, well worth the price.
My baby was born prematurely and so when we brought her she was super small and weighed only 5lbs 13oz and she fit perfectly in this car seat!

This was one of the more expensive options we considered, but it was worth every penny for the ease of installation. We picked this model for the click tight seatbelt feature and also for the narrow profile of the car seat as we are now doing three across. My least favorite thing about this car seat is that for some reason the straps are constantly getting twisted, but other than that it was a great purchase
Arms are so wide the bottom belt sits across the child's lap instead of hip the booster is so tall that the top belt sits on the bottom of the shoulder...poor design and not safe

Only gripe is the angle.  It follows the angle of your seat flawlessly, however, I have a pickup truck and the back seat doesn’t recline.  It would be amazing if it came with an attachment for the rear/back/bottom (wedge or pad) which would slightly push out the seat so I can then push back for a bit of recline.  My child’s head tends to fall forward when she falls asleep.  Currently just roll up a jacket I have which seems to work a bit, but it doesn’t allow me to tighten firmly the child hooks

We were worried at first because this material is not as plush/cozy as our previous Britax seat, but our girls love it even more. The material and padding is just the right mix to allow for comfort, but not over heat. It’s also much much easier to clean this than a plush material. Our girls also liked the seat pad that added additional comfort.  We enjoyed the removable seat pad for all the gross things that just happen sometimes with kids.

Used for my 4 year old and 7 year old in a car rental and Lyft rides. Can pack away easily in a backpack. When not traveling, we keep one in each car for carpooling. Kid has to sit on it the correct way for it to work properly.

The carseat was advertised as used or open box and it looked brand new. The only draw back I have is that I have it rear facing in an suv and it is too tall for me to reach back and give the baby anything (from the passenger side). But the design gives me peace of mind that my baby is secure and protected.
Excellent seat. I love the feature to raise the height/harness with disassembling the whole seat. Great price for such a great product!

We love this booster seat! My 7 year old says that's it's comfortable and that he much prefers it to his last seat, the Diono Radian (he got too tall for the 5 or harness). Very easy to install and take out and has two very sturdy cup and snack holders.
Very light weight and easy to use and move from one car to another!

When I pulled the parts out of the box, I found the arm rest had been smashed against the seat cushion and caused a permanent deformity to the cushion. I contacted customer service and was sent another one. It arrived the same. I contacted Graco and they sent me a new one that also arrived deformed but significantly less. I'm sure it doesn't affect the level of safety of the seat, but if I'm paying this much money for a brand new seat, I don't want one that has a large deformed seat cushion.

my very tall 6 year old fits this seat great. We just switched from a 5 point harness that we've outgrown, and this seat still has a comfy seat, cool little compartment, cup holder, and cushioned head rest.
I LOVE this carseat.  Bought myself the chicco next flip and this one for my husband, and I like this one way better than mine.

Special Features: Rear Facing Seat, Machine Washable Seat Pad, LATCH Compatible
Review: I have 5 kids now and I have bought this seat for each of them!! I absolutely love this infant carrier!!!!
It was shipped promptly and my 7 month old Grandson has plenty of room to grow in this.. He's big for his age and wear 24 month old clothing..very pleased with this!!!

Great chair, son loves it but my only slight gripe was a that it doesn't come with a strap to secure the base into the seat restraint clips. The chair is only secured by the passenger and their seatbelt.
Would but again

It was easy to install watched a YouTube video about the install instructions. So happy that I finally found a car seat that fits in between 2 Evenflo EveryStage DLX car seats. I have a 2014 Nissan Pathfinder and these car seats are located in 2nd row. I am so glad my third child doesn’t have to sit in the 3rd row alone anymore. Happy kids, happy mom.
Love it buy it for my two year old perfect

Special Features: Super Easy, Car Rental inflatable packable portable luggage travel
Review: I needed a temporary booster for my son and this works great.  My son sits pretty still which helps a lot. Overall works great

Special Features: Super Easy, Car Rental inflatable packable portable luggage travel
Review: I can't say enough about this booster seat: it is IIHS safety rated, it inflates and deflates easily and has come in super handy! We used it on a trip to DC where we used cabs only; when not in the cab, we deflated and put it the back pack. This seat has also come in handy during times when we all wanted to carpool spur of the moment. Rather than having to uninstall the one from our car, we just inflated this seat (because we tossed it in the trunk since it takes up little space). I highly recommend it for travel and those just in case moments when you all want to pile into someone else's car on a whim. I do not think it is a replacement for a traditional booster and wouldn't purchase it solely for that purpose.
Grear seat

Special Features: Parent Link Customer Service, Live Video Installation Support
Review: Es muy ligero. Me gusto mucho
I love this chair !
It is good structurally ,other than the head rest is very flimbsy. Not adequate! Mine as well not have one.

While our Diono car seat purchased when my son was 3 months old is still good and works as a booster, I wanted an extra for friends and travel. It’s the perfect seat to get us through the booster seat years!
My niece love it
Very nice!
Wonderful car seat. Even able to fit in the back of a tiny hyundai accent. My 7 month old is comfortable with the infant insert. The cup holders are also nice.
Great seat
Great head support plenty of space and can be adjust in easy steps best one ive seen
Love the new harness attachments. Easy to put together and my kids can use it without my help properly.
Super easy install. We move this seat back and forth between vehicles with ease. Seems comfortable. There have been no complaints even on long car rides.

Special Features: Car seat and suitcase sold separately
Review: This worked great when we traveled with our 2 year old and 4 year old. It is easy to hook the car seat on and our daughter loved riding in her car seat. Love how compact and functional this little product is!

I like this seat for the price. The recline feature is useful, but putting it back into the upright position is difficult, and it has pinched me terribly more than once. Also, the headrest must be scooted up each time when I put our niece into the seat, which is a pain. I don't have much to compare it to, but for our purposes it works.
Works better than expected.

I love this car seat, it is heavy so you wont want this one if you need to swap it from car to car but it reclines nicely, is easy to install (read the directions to ensure you're using the proper install for your car) and my daughter doesn't complain.  She's 15 months and rear facing in this seat comfortably. Cup holders are removable which is a huge plus for us and it's easy to take apart and clean.
It's not heavy, very cute
Perfect for our 19 month old toddler.

Easy to assemble and install.
It’s also easy looking.

I don't love this car seat quite as much as my last one, but it does have great features. I like the steel frame, padding in the straps and the crotch straps are very easy for me to unbuckle. The ClickTight feature is an unnecessary upgrade in my opinion, but generally easy to use and nice to have. In retrospect, I'd probably buy the Marathon instead bc I think it would be just as good and is cheaper.  Overall, solid seat that I look forward to using for years to come.
Very happy brith this product
My son loves it
Doesn't recline in forward facing position.  Only rear facing. Fabric is easily stained. Washing only removes some stains. Do feel like my child is safe in it though.

This seat is awesome and built very well. Based on all of the positive reviews I think the quality of this item speaks for itself. The only issue I have is that it is pretty big compared to what we had before, but I guess that is linked to all of the quality and safety features that it has. We are still rear facing and I think once we face forward it will be a lot better to get in and out of. Installed in a midsize 4 sedan and an SUV (works better in the SUV)

Pleased with the purchase and would recommend to a friend - that is how we discovered it as well.

Comfy, easy to install..but its a second car (not our main) carseat. Personally feels a bit thin in the way of safety compared to our graco convertible extend to fit. .. I think its a great, inexpensive extra, and the baby enjoys it. So no complaints.

Special Features: Removable Tray, Safety Harness, Folds for Easy Transport and Storage
Review: I purchased this chair at babiesrus and love it so far. It is pladtic so it easy to clean, has decent weight to it, is study and COMPACT! It is a great travel seat. My only 2 complaints would be that it lacks any cushion for my babies tush.. and it does not recline. As far as the adjustable height, do not expect anything WOW. The main idea of this seat is that it is compact and can be put on a chair. And also the table part is a bit hard to take on and off as to where normal table tops slide on and off.

Special Features: Online Chat: Chat with our ParentLink customer service experts online in real time, Live Video Installation Support: Schedule an appointment to have a certified car seat safety technician guide you through a proper vehicle installation
Review: I love the revolving concept. Easier on the back and the baby.

This has worked very well for us, the kids seem comfortable in these seats, it is easy to get the kids in them (other seat i have had have presented more of a challenge to get the kids in them).  Would recommend

Great seat! love the cup holders and the fact they can be pushed in if you need the room. Easy in and out and lightweight. My 4 yr old is comfortable and hasn't complained about it. He's been using it for several months now.

I used this car seat for my baby from newborn at 6lbs to 11 mos at 20 lbs. It is light, easy to clean and my daughter was more comfortable & snug than in her other Graco car seat.

Most importantly, we were in a car accident where we were hit from behind hard and she was fine. I sustained a head concussion and other driver was injured. The car seat thankfully did its job.
It didn't have any type of instruction. It wasn't even wrapped. Just thrown down in the box
we love this car seat!! plus it looks great too.
Assembly was almost complete when received; however, assembly instructions were inadequate.  If not a mechanic or mechanical engineer, good luck.

I LOVE this car seat. It is sturdy, high quality, seems comfortable and has little places for the child to stash things (cars, snacks, etc.) in the side so they are easily accessible to toddler, and of course the cup holder. Speaking of, the cup holder is super sturdy. It is part of the actual build of the seat, not a cheap flimsy add on. Can't beat the price for this kind of quality!

It is easy to take apart and clean. My son has been car sick a couple of times and we've been able to take it apart and get it super clean again without much trouble.

I cannot speak for the rear facing feature for infants, I always used a traditional infant carrier, which I would reccommend. Their Snugride35 is what we've used and we love that, too.

I would never buy a different seat for my kids! They will both use this seat for as long as they are in one.
I bought 1 to test it out in a captains chair in a yukon.  Fits perfectly so i bought another.  No real complaints from the kids and they love the cupholders.
Works as intended, simple and functional and stylish. Side compartment is useless and hard to open.  Should of just put another cup holder there

Compact and easy to install but it wasn't the seat for us.
The sides were too hight which made the seat feel like it was sorta 'bucket' style and very deep. This made it difficult to put my son in it, especially if he resisted at all, also made it hard to not hit his head on the vehicle ceiling :o
I didn't like that I was so reclined, my son was not happy riding in it.
Also the material was hot, even on a short ride my sons head was soaked when we got home.
Returned and ordered the 4ever by Graco, more expensive but so worth the extra money!!!
Best car seat and my son loves it! Although the color clashes with my all maroon exterior and interior 😂
Good carseat for the price. Didn't get 5 stars because the cup holders are on the small side and don't fit the sippy cups we use

For the price this was really designed very poorly. It won't tighten down properly if your back seat is slightly angled so the manual literally suggests using a rolled towel. It still doesn't feel super secure. The 5 point harness takes an act of God to tighten properly.  Even once it tightens down it all moves alot.  I suggest buying a seat that has two LATCH clicks that are independent of one another. We ended up buying a different car seat for the other vehicle and I really wish we had returned this one and bought two of the other. And if your little one falls asleep in the car, their head will most assuredly be resting on their chest.  It's honestly just terrible all around.

I bought two of these booster seats because my daughter's 6 & 5 year olds were out growing their car seats. The modern sleek look of these seats had me stopping and reading the reviews and although some stated they were on the big side, I took a chance on them and I'm so glad I did. I have an older model Honda Odyssey and the seats fit perfectly. They were easy to assemble as you snap together the top and bottom part which were separated in the box. It was pretty simple to hook them in my van as I attached the two ancore hooks on the bottom of the booster seat to the van's seat. The seats are sturdy once strapped in correctly and don't move around. Then I weaved the seat belt through the hole in the booster chair as seen in pic. They feel nice, look nice, and have good safety features as the sides are wide enough for protection and comfort. They also have two pull out cup holders on both sides of the seats that can fit juice boxes and snacks. These seats are really nice as I've gotten complaments from other moms about them too, so if you have the room these booster seats are great to have.
Better for my granddaughter than the one she had--easier  to use.
Easy to install.  Works great.
Works well in a pinch when traveling and ubering. Kids like them. They are very easy to inflate and deflate.
I thought these would clip into the bottom like the ones with a backpiece... otherwise I liked it. Love the cup holder swivel.

Special Features: Removable Tray, Safety Harness, Folds for Easy Transport and Storage
Review: Great for my 16 month old who started trying to climb her high chair for fun. Love that it folds up and I can push the chair all the way in.
Just couldn’t get the security straps to tighten it was so difficult not even my husband could do it. I eventually used the seat belts other than that I liked it very much

I really like this cart. It is very helpful when you want to travel with a heavy toddler car seat. I even use it to transport some heavy boxes when I need to. I definitely recommend it. Buy it buy it!!!!!!!!!!! I wish it came with a belt cord since you can’t just use the one that’s on the car seat, you need an additional cord to make sure the car seat stays on the cart. Greatfully I had an extra one that I used otherwise it was gonna be really hard and even unsafe to move it with my toddler sitting in the car seat.
I purchased this for my 8 year old grandson and was afraid he might think it was too childish.  He loves it! He can buckle himself in, and is very comfortable with his new booster seat.

Extremelly happy with this chair, I purchased 4 of them, 2 are a year old and u can't barely tell with ones are the new ones. Very easy to clean, comfortable my sons don't ever cry while going on a longer trip. When try fall asleep the head don't hang forward just keep the head straight. Very satisfied!

Love these boosters this green is lighter color then it looks but I love the cup holders and that it will recline with the seat. I take my headrest off the car's seat so it fits well against the seat. This is my second seat, my older son has been using his for about 2 yrs now.

I have a 7 year old who is small for his age and will need a seat for a few years to come still. This product has been fantastic for when he goes with friends who are out growing their seats already. We can just stick it in his back pack to take along! After a few days of helping he was able to get down the way the belts fit into the seat and can work it on his own and with a baby on the way, this opens our back seat up with more space!

Special Features: Removable Tray, Safety Harness, Folds for Easy Transport and Storage
Review: Works great, very handy when a full high chair isn't available. It's more comfortable and sanitary than restaurant high chairs.
This is the only booster seat I could find that has the five point harness for children weighing more than 40 pounds.  It was worth the money.  Easy to install and easy to buckle the harness.
Perfect for traveling. Or everyday life. Small compact. My child loves it. The color is bright and different from any other carseat out there.

It works fairly well, better than our infant seat carrier.  But, it is pretty big, seems like it takes up too much room in the rear-facing position.  And it seems to be tipsy, so we had to use towels to keep it propped.  And the straps don't seem to tighten easily.  They pull too hard - lots of cussing under my breath... I did a lot of research and found this model to be highly rated, but I wouldn't rate it as high as others.  I guess you just don't know until you try it yourself
good.

This is our second Graco Nautilus car seat, and I'm only leaving this review to update feedback on a seat that has seen some running changes.

First let me say that my wife and I love our first Nautilus that we purchased about 2 years ago. This new seat appears mostly the same but has a few key differences that reduce the its appeal. I'll note them here:

*Buckle is different - now a "push in" vs. the older "push down" and smaller. Just not as friendly and easy to use as the old latch.
*Locking clips - the two clips that get inserted into that changed buckle are now smaller and here's the worst part, they slide more easily on the straps. What this means is that with the old seat those clips would stay roughly in position when you unbuckled your child. Now with the looser clips, you will find they always end up sitting awkwardly at the base of the seat, right back at that very rear corner. This requires you to dig under your child to get them every time you buckle them in. Sigh.
*Liner. Liner just tends to slide around a lot more in the seat making it more of a hassle to use.
*Smaller buckle and loose liner combo. Both of the above changes, looser liner, smaller buckle cause the buckle to pop out of the liner slot if/when your child "slides" out of the seat. This means that if you aren't paying attention the next time you put them into the seat you are digging around, again, under their bum to navigate the buckle back through the liner slot. It just makes you want to ditch the liner entirely.

Anyway, this is still a good car seat, it's just not a great as is used to be and new buyers should be aware of these running changes.
This car seat was rated very high for safety.

This is a very poor design. The foam under the butt ripped off after about 6 months of use because the poorly designed tabs that are intended to hold the cover on do not. The single pull strap for mounting is a nice thought but it make it much harder to install. It never really gets as tight as I want it. And for what its worth, my cheapo car seats have ratcheting straps and install in seconds. Why can't Britax come up with something like that at twice the price? Further, the strap gets jammed in the clips when tightening it. Then you have to pull every muscle in your back to get it loose again. I have another Britax carseat. The carseat is a much superior design and comes with two pull points. This piece of junk was designed to meet a low cost point and I assume the margin was very good on it. The consequence is a very low quality product that functions poorly. I won't buy Britax anything after owning this heap of garbage.

This was one of the few infant carriers that fit into my car. Thankfully, it’s a well known brand and is very safe and durable.

When the carrier is locked into the base in the car, there is absolutely no movement at all. The locking mechanism is very sturdy and has nongice to it at all.

The carrier itself is very lightweight, compared to others that I have had the chance to carry. It is a bit pricey, given the amount of time it is used for, but for the safety of my son, there is no amount I wouldn’t have spent.

Special Features: Super Easy, Car Rental inflatable packable portable luggage travel
Review: not for fat kids, my small kid could barely fit on it, belt strap would not stay in position, not good for cars with leather seats.. the bubble bum just slides all over.

Best than expected!! I bought it because my baby hated the one he has before and I hoped this one will make him feel comfortable, and oh wao! He loved it!!! No more crying, and he likes the padded things, he goes all the ride touching everything like it wasn't real! I cannot say much about space because I have a Tucson 2016 and it fits like the other one we had. Between this one and my daughter's booster seat you have a small space for a person to be seated not for a long trip. The best thing is how easy to install it is and it feels very secure and safe.
The cover doesn't stay on the seat...pretty frustrating!  This is the absolute hardest car seat to take in and out of the vehicle!  Extremely frustrating!

Update jan. 2015... Still an incredible seat. Taking it apart to wash it also easier than seats we've had in the past. I noticed some reviews on tightening so wanted to add my experience. This seat does not tighten like ordinary car seats, I find I have to press in the little metal mechanism for loosening it to tighten as well but then it tightens and stays perfectly. Recently with winter coats some days and sweatshirts another we've done a lot of this but the seat is still my favorite of all seats (including other britax models) we've owned.

I ended up ordering this seat for my 2 1/2 year old after we were in an accident and had to replace car seats. THIS SEAT IS THE BEST. I had a newer Britax convertible before and loved it but this is so much butter... but the CLICKTIGHT installation seat belt locking mechanism in this pinacle is awesome. I was skeptical after reading the description and instruction manual as to whether it would be as tight as the LATCH system (but figured it came with the latch so if need be I'd use that)-- but it is sooooo much better better than the LATCH and so easy! I always had to have my husband tighten the car seats after putting them in with the latch to get them in real tight-- NOT WITH THIS SYSTEM! So easy.. you just run the seatbelt through the seat where it tells you, lock the seat down over it and it is done... and the seat is locked in much tighter than I could ever get it with the latch. Getting it out is even easier... you just press the squeeze the buttons that are secured under a seat panel and unbuckle the belt and out you go.

As for the size- it is a nice big seat- so perfect for toddlers with all the safety features, everything is adjustable. Another great option I wish Britax did on all of their car seats-- BUILT IN CUPHOLDER!!! Perfect for toddlers that want a drink in the car with them. If I would have know about this, I would have moved my daughter into this when she was 1.... This seat is heavy-- there is no doubt when you pick it up that this is well built. I wouldn't hesistate to buy or spend the extra money on this at all... well worth it.
Grandson loves the seat. Very comfortable. Easy to install.

I bought a Britax Marathon a little under two years ago for my son, thinking they are the best and would last the longest. It's a pretty big price to pay for a car seat, but I figured it would be better to pay a little more for something that we could use longer. The car seat has been nice, not too much more to note than our other cheaper car seats, but it's done its job and felt safe. Today I notched the stitching on the top of the car seat was coming undone and leaving a big hole. The car seat sits in our car, hardly ever moved, for my two year old son. I don't have any idea how the stitching could already be coming undone. I called Britax, hoping that they would stand by their product and send me a new cover for it, but they won't. They give you one year. Even my cheaper Chicco car seat and stroller have been happy to send new parts when there's are failing, in a reasonable time frame, even over a year. For the cost of this seat, the cover should not be falling apart after less than two years. I'm very disappointed in the product, but also very disappointed that a company such as this would not stand by their product and fix the problem. I have a cheap but comparible car seat from Costco that my six year old sits in, never a stitch undone and never a problem. Britax has definitely lost a customer.

Everything was removable to throw in the wash except the armrest covers. My children unfortunately get very motion sick in the car and I discovered this while trying to clean the vomit. I now have a smelly seat, if your kids get very car sick I'd pick a different one. I love the latch feature on this seat though, I wish more boosters had them!

Thoroughly pleased with this purchase.  Made in USA, very sturdy, easy to install and tighten with two LATCH clips, feels quite safe.  Silver Birch color is quite attractive.  I wish the cup holder and/or side storage pocket were included in the purchase, but they're not too expensive and they did install easily.  It's not the cheapest car seat, but what price do you put on your child's safety and how much is your time worth if you have to fight for hours to install/remove/adjust the car seat?
Fits well in our Prius without jamming the front seat forward too far!!  We are currently using it rear facing.

My son loves his new "big kid" carseat.  He is very comfortable, loves the cup holders for water bottles or small treasures and likes that it is lower than his old carseat.  I love that it has a 5-point harness and I feel like he is very safe.  Since I pretty much leave it in my car, I am not concerned about the weight (it is a bit heavy) nor about installation (it was harder than the Britax Marathon we had previously - using the car shoulder belt.)  All in all it is a really solid, safe seat and I feel confident having my son traveling in it.
Great car seat. Have had for almost a year with no complaints.

We love this booster! I love how you can easily secure this booster to your seat, unlike previous models or boosters. It fits more securely and has a latch system that is much easier to install. Will buy another one for my other child as well.
Very easy to use, nice padding.
We really like this booster seat.  It is lightweight but sturdy, easy to clean, and easy to use.
wonderful careseat, I love Graco products.

I really like this car seat.  I got it for my one year old daughter when she outgrew the carrier infant seat.  This works great as a rear facing car seat until she can go to forward facing.  I love the colors, it's super comfy, and the extra cushions are removable if you prefer.  It's really easy to install and overall a great value for the price.
Great size and comfort for the kids.

This car seat makes getting my kid in and out sooo easy. One weird side effect though- we started calling it our kid’s “squatty potty” because every. single. time he gets into it, he poops within 2 minutes. Initially when we got this, he was only 3 months old so not eating solids yet. Unfortunately, that meant blow-out city. Not sure what it is about the car seat but maybe the tilt or something, but I had to clean it after just about every trip due to his blowouts. Luckily he’s eating solids now, so we haven’t had a blowout in it in a couple of months (knock on wood). I will say, if you’re kid is constipated, get this car seat and it’ll solve your problem.
Great seat and so comfy and safe for my daughter.

Special Features: Super Easy, Car Rental inflatable packable portable luggage travel
Review:
As a parent of three kids (5, 3 and 18 months) I'm faced with the oh-too-familiar problem of finding a way to fit three child car seats in the back of my vehicle. I have a mid-sized SUV with one row of back seats and - with my 5-year-old about to graduate into a booster - I knew fitting three seats side-by-side would be an issue.

I was initially skeptical about the BubbleBum because it seems such a small, inconsequential and inadequate proposition. But I'm pleasantly surprised to report that my expectations were completely unfounded. First off the size and portability is unbeatable. I was concerned that it would be too awkward to function as a booster seat for long-journeys, but my five-year-old is completely comfortable sitting on it. It sits - with ample room to spare - between two other child's car seats and there is plenty of space.

Buckling in and out is easy. Just guide the regular lap-belt portion of your car's standard seatbelts through the two red guide clips, and you're done. This literally takes seconds to do and is far less complicated than I feared from reading some of the descriptions online.

Set-up was also super-easy. Just blow-it up like a balloon, insert the air-stopping valve and you're done. The added bonus is that the BubbleBum also serves as a portable option - so if your child is traveling in a different car.....or if you need something for a taxi or a rental car.....it's extremely portable.
Great heavy car seat!

We've been using our Britax Roundabout for over a year now. We had heard that it was a safe seat worth its cost. It is! We love it!

PROS:
My son seems comfortable in it, whether he's awake or asleep.
The harness is easy to adjust.
I love that the fabric is soft and doesn't get hot (like vinyl can) and that it's easy to clean.
It works great both rear and front facing.
The seat fits him very well. He is 33" tall, 28 lbs., and almost 2 years old. This seat fits as well now as it did a year ago. I can see him fitting in it for at least another year, probably two.

CONS:
It's bulkier and harder to get in and out of the car than infant seats are, but that is to be expected of a toddler seat.
When the seat was new, the dial that you use to loosen or tighten the harness belts sometimes was "sticky" or difficult to release and turn. We are used to pushing harder, and it also has become less "sticky."

Trying to get the seat belt through and bucked is so hard. It is tiny and my husband can't even get his hand through so I have to do it, and it's still tight to get my smaller hand through. It's also hard to tighten the straps on the baby. Other than that seems like a good strong carseat.
Es bien seguro para el bebé pero un poco incómodo amarrar el cinturón

I was in a terrifying car wreck 5 days ago. The white car in the picture tried to cut across traffic and I smashed into them going 45 mph with no chance to slow down. I have no doubts that this car seat saved my daughter's life, I am forever grateful to the Britax company for keeping her safe. I am so glad I took the advice from other amazon members who recommended it!
Padding is thin

Fantastic car seat. Installed in about 5 minutes, in the back of a Mini Cooper. Left enough room for the baby carrier to go beside it. I love the easy anchor clips, and the straps being so easily adjusted. Fantastic purchase.

We bought this as a spare carseat. It claims to be easy to install, but it's a pain to connect the hooks. Reaching the belt through is easy, but its those hooks that are really annoying. Feel like they should have made an extender, seeing as how the different cars I've put it into for rides have not all been the same on the hooks attached to the car.

This fits perfectly in my car.  I have an older car, a 1990 that has a lap belt.  This fits snug and secure, and my 10 month old seems very comfortable.  Actually more comfortable than in our more expensive Graco, and the strap is easier to tighten when putting her into it.

We have used this for a few months now and it still looks new. It is holding up really well. I was worried about the memory foam losing its shape or becoming less firm with time, but we haven't noticed that at all. It also takes up so much less space than other car seats we looked at. We do not have any other seats in the car anymore since this is my youngest - but the extra space I notice is really nice. We are already on the second to highest shoulder strap level, so that is my biggest concern that he may outgrow it quickly - but the specifications imply he should be fine for at least a year so I guess it will depend on our growth spurts this year.
This seat was the perfect size, fit neatly in the car, love the cup holders & arm rests.

This is a good car seat for safety, but for the travel there is no type of support for the baby . My grandson is 6 weeks and he hates being in this seat because there is no cushion support. I have to buy an extra cushion for him.
Love it love it. He doesnt fight about being in it. I think he likes it. Sleeps good in the car.

Bought this car seat so I would have one when I had my granddaughter. I Love it!!! Would Definately recommend to anyone looking for a car seat! I like the fact that she will be able to use it for a long time!! Again, I am Very pleased with this purchase!!!

I ordered the Graco “4ever all in one” and loved it as soon as I saw it but once I put my daughter in it, saw how uncomfortable it was for her. The back had no support and the head pillow was too far out so that her chin was on her chest.

I bought this one when a friend told me she had one and liked it. It’s not as “luxurious” as the Graco but is more comfortable for my girl. It feels a little cheaper but gets the job done. As with most convertible car seats, her head falls forward a little and I have to put toys in the crack by her shoulder to keep her head up.

We just got this car seat about a week ago, and we love it! A lot of the reviews talked about how how difficult it was to install rear facing, I really found it very simple to install. The only thing that was a bit difficult is when tightening the anchors, the belt was a bit hard to pull. Other than that the car seat is cute, comfy for my daughter and is just what we were looking for
easy to install in any vehicle i have tried! so simple for a single mom
My son loves Batman and this fits him perfectly

I bet that title caught your eye! Actually we take our grandson to daycare every day since it doesn't start early enough for Mom or Dad to drop him off directly there. So having our own equipment has made things so much more easy.
Love the color.  Very easy to put together.

They are easy to transfer to different vehicles, and they're pretty good overall. But the straps are always coming off, then they always get tangled in the back and can't adjust the length from the front. And my kids keep unbuckling themselves, which is awful!!

We have 3 boys (3, 5 & 6) and space in the minivan has always been an issue. The fact that these can be mounted 3 wide in a minivan is AMAZING! Now we have extra space and the kids can easily get in and out of the van.
The frames are reinforced with steel and just plain beefy. I can't say enough about these seats... truly amazing.

This seat is a lot cheaper than most others, and it really shows. Adjustment for the child's height is difficult, involving detaching and re-attaching the shoulder straps from the back. Recline angle isn't adjustable, except by moving the entire seat, and then there's nothing to keep it in position unless you stuff a rolled-up towel behind it. The real deal-killer though is that in the rear-facing mode it is impossible to tighten either the LATCH belt or the car belt enough for safely: the seat shifts around too much.

Returned, and replaced by a GRACO costing more than twice as much. That's sad, but there's a reason.

Note:My vehicle is a Mustang Mach E. YMMV.
My son used this seat until he was able to move to a booster, now my daughter is using it. It adjusts nicely and seems to be of high quality.
love it, little one looks comfortable
Very cute sit for my little one. She fits prefect!
Great for my six year old Grandson.

This carseat is everything I was looking for! My little girl is quite large but not old enough to forward face. Most carseats only go to 40lbs rear facing. When researching carseats with a higher weight limit, i found this one. It goes up to 50lbs rear facing and it's cute! What i didn't expect was that it fits so perfectly in my small car. The latch system for the other carseat didn't work in my car but this one is PERFECT! It's super simple to install, too! Also, my girl has long legs so giving her some extra leg room is wonderful! The safety features are also awesome! The harness is easy to move up or down as needed! It also seems really comfy for my girl! I definitely love that it comes with the padded shoulder straps because our other carseat seems to dig into her neck no matter how I position it. I love this carseat! I would definitely recommend!

My 18 month old loves it! He actually climbs on the car himself to get in his car seat. My son somehow opened his go-gurt and got it everywhere, and it was so easy to clean. The covering comes right off and can go in the washer. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
This car seat is perfect for little one
Difficult to get a good install and a good fit.

Special Features: Machine Washable Seat Pad, Forward Facing Seat
Review: The parts buckle to the seatbelt are missing. No way to install the booster without the parts. I’ll return it.
I wish it had a better safety insert for baby's but everything else is great it also goes with my stroller that I got 3 years ago
I'm out of practice on carseats, but it seems this one is a little hard to adjust the straps.
Love it purchased a second one
מוצר נהדר!
Car seat is easy to install and put baby in
Great carseat with soft cushion and easy to install. Highly recommend
My son is not really like to sit on car seat, but this one, he just love it. He can sit on there over 2 hours during the trip. He like it, I like it .

Very comfortable and seems to be very durable my only complaint is it needs a recliner base on the bottom for when using rear facing I have to keep blankets stuffed under it to keep it level with the lines on the side and honestly I probably wouldn't have bought this one if I had noticed it didn't have one!
this one is good and my son likes it. It is safe for kids under 4 year old.

Updated review: after we had used the seat for a couple of years, the foam in the headpiece popped off both of our seats (we had one in my car and another in my husband’s car). Called Graco, and they replaced them with the exact same seat. (EXCELLENT customer service!) 8 months later, and the foam popped off AGAIN. Called Graco, and they switched us to a different seat altogether. We had three other Graco car seat models, and no issues with the foam. I think it’s just an issue with this particular model. I still LOVE this company and received excellent customer service twice! I highly recommend Graco, just not this particular seat.

This is an excellent seat. Easy to adjust to fit your precious little one. Easy to install. My daughter loves it!
Only way to loosen or tighten the straps is from behind; very uncomfortable.

I already own two of these carseats and just ordered this one for my third child. I have been extremely pleased with them! Installation is very simple and it is very easy to change them over to another car (when they go with grandma for the day). It is also very, very easy to adjust these to your child's size. My older two children find them very comfortable and have no issues sleeping in them on long trips. This carseat is a good choice if you want to rear face your child for a longer period of time - they can rear face until 40 pounds in this seat! The material washes up nicely if your kid has an accident or gets carsick - I have had to wash ours several times (be sure to follow the washing guidelines in the manual) and they still look good as new!

I have been very pleased with Graco's customer service! I have called a few times with general questions and product issues. They have always helped me to quickly resolve any issue I may be having. It's nice to know that you have a good company reputation behind a product that is keeping your child safe!

Special Features: Super Easy, Car Rental inflatable packable portable luggage travel
Review: Looks good, works fine, should last a long time.
Love!  Best Booster Seat ever!  So easy to use and very safe!

This car seat is light weight, looks good, and has comfortable padding for baby. My issue was that it didn’t fit in the back of my 2015 Chevrolet Cruze so that the passenger seat would be far enough back for someone to get in the car. I ended up having to get a different car seat for my car and my husband is using this one in his fourrunner.
I bought 2 and my kids love them. Had more room in my back seat compared to the other 2 car seats I had.
Great design, easy install. My only complaint, is how are you gonna revolutionize a design to rotate and swivel and be easily removed for "on the go" and not include a carrying handle design??
Love carseat, but I have a Nissan juke and it will not fit in rear facing position .
I brought this seat for my 22 lb 1 year old for her birthday and she LOVED it!  She is comfortable in this seat and she also loves the cup holder.

I love this carseat. I have owned a few over the last 5 years and this one is still the best. It's a little large but that is the only negative. I feel my child is safer in this seat than any child I have put in any other seat. This is how you want to feel about a carseat.
It's cute and light and easy to use.

Special Features: 2 cup holders, 3 harness height positions, 5-point adjustable sagety harness, Superior side impact protection, Padded shoulder and crotch covers
Review: Really sturdy, to heavy and to heard to unbuckle grandson. As I lurn more about the car seat it's getting easier to use.
Great seat makes child sweat though

This was one of the only seats I could find for my daughter that had great reviews and was reasonably priced. She is a small almost 4 year old that legally can be in a booster, but is in no way ready for that. This is a perfect compromise as she is still strapped in a five point harness, but has the option to be a booster later. Our absolute favorite part about this seat is how easy it is to install. The new ratcheting latch system is fantastic! You simply click the hooks in and push on the seat to automatically ratchet tight. It is the tightest install we have been able to achieve with a child car seat and it is so easy to move from car to car because of the simplicity of installation. We can now leave the carseats with grandparents and rest assured that our kids will be safe in their cars too because they will be able to install the carseats correctly.

Perfect for my son!  My baby was 10.5 lbs at birth and at 2 months he is 18 lbs.  Bc of his age he struggles with his head still but needs something big enough for his body yet supportive enough for his age.  This was a huge blessing compared to the little pumpkin seat he quickly outgrew.  He also is always a hot baby and would sweat in his last seat.  This one keeps him cool and warm when needed. He is very comfortable! I would highly suggest it!
It does the job well, just wish it had a safety clip to lock it onto the seat of the vehicle because when my son moves it moves with him.

This is a good seat. Graco has done it again.

Pro- sleak look and appeal, the material is appropriate for hot summer days, keeping my son's head cool. We haven't had it in winter yet.
Pro- sturdy strong, metal frame....it has the latch that hooks to the car which is the BEST way to secure the seat.
Pro-It fits my son like a charm, so soft and comfortable; he rides so well in it.
Pro- so easy to assemble. It practically came ready to go out the box!
Pro- the cup holder position is great for convenient use, unlike other seat where the holder is further away where younger children can't reach
Pro- the new release button on the crotch is easier to use. no slip ups with getting baby in and out of the car anymore
Pro- I LOVE HOW THIS SEAT converts into a booster. We will NOT have to buy another car seat as our child grows!!!!!
Pro- great price point

Cons- the seat does have the ability to "tilt" but you don't notice a difference
Cons-when looking up seats I did see the reacll for this seat about the crotch button, but it's been corrected and it simple to use
la silla cumple con lo esperado.
Nice

This graco convertible car seat is very well made. You can see and feel how solid and sturdy it is. This car seat is not heavy at all and very easy to install. Lots of space for your child and very safe. For the price I definitely recommend it. Great product!
This car seat is better than anything I saw at target, Walmart and toys r us. Easy to install and it looks very comfortable. Worth it expense

Bought it to connect with my 2015 Uppababy Vista and it did just that!!!
Exactly what I needed! (since this is from the classic connect series as opposed to the click connect it fits with the Graco adapter)
It could use some kind of safety straps that anchors the booster seat to the vehicle seats. This would make the seat more secure.
Grandson loves it
Solid buy.

We love this carseat so much that we have one for both of our children!  Last year I was in a car wreck with my 3 year old we T-boned another car going about 40mph.  My daughter didn't have a scratch on her and she never even cried!  Our '07 Odyssey's frame was so crunched we couldn't get the sliding doors open, but she never knew!  I cannot say enough good things about this carseat.  Most people that see them in their car seats call it the recliner because of it is so comfy looking.  I recommend this carseat to all of my friends.  It is super easy to adjust and cleaning the cover is just as easy!  If you are looking for a safe carseat you cannot go wrong with this one!
So much room now in my car. My son who is tall loves it!!

Easy to put together though I am now pretty good at knowing how these things work.  My son said it was comfortable and it is easy to install and light weight to carry around when needed...  I recommend it.
This is an amazing car seat. It's so easy to understand and use :).
Purchased for my almost 4 1/2 yr old to use in the taxi on our trip. Set up was quick and easy and he was comfortable.

Best carseat ever! My granddaughter
Is so comfortable in this seat and she is
17 months and 30 lbs. Attaches and detaches easily. Sturdy and comfy!
We're pleased so far with the seat, cheaper on here than what it was at fred Meyers!
Rated very high for safety.  Had fire department install it in my vehicle the first time.  Use this for my granddaughter so we do take it out occasionally, has been pretty easy to reinstall.
I love this carseat..... My only dislike is the cup holder but all in all it's a grate carseat!
It was exactly as advertised, easy to install and modify, and my 3 year old grandson says that it is very comfortable.

We bought this seat for my 9mo son & he loves it! It's roomier than the newborn seat, the safety ratings are great, but the reason I gave it four stars is because it was a little difficult to change the strap positioning. It's very easy to get him in & out of, he's comfortable, & he can use it for a long time! Great product!
We just got this yesterday. So far, we like it. The material is so soft. The reclining option I LOVE!!! And it's a big recline, not just a tilt.
I really like this car seat. One thing is when trying to tighten the straps it doesnt tighten very well. Would get again though.
I love it .., is very nice

This is a very heavy duty car seat. It will protect our baby well. The only problem is installation. I shouldn't have to have a degree in engineering to install a car seat. The manual is thorough, but it is still really hard to unlatch the cover as instructed in order to be able to thread the seat belt through the slot.

Special Features: Removable Tray, Safety Harness, Folds for Easy Transport and Storage
Review: Chair works great for the grand daughter, previous reviews indicated the tray was hard to remove, it is not! Very easy and convenient to use.  Allows our little one to be at the table with us.  Easy to clean and store.
Wonderful car seat. Very well made. Difficult to install! I would suggest taking it to your fire department to properly install.
Brought my newborn son home from the hospital in this car seat. His neck was supported by the pads on the straps and he was secure all the way home. Love it!
Cant get better than dinosaurs.
Love this booster. My son says it’s comfortable. It’s easy to adjust, install, and switch between vehicles. The two hide-away cup holders are really convenient, too.
Love this seat for my daughter. It's comfortabke, easy to install and adjust. I feel confident that she's safe.

not sure if it's just me but i've had an extremely difficult time tightening this seat.  Seems like it shouldn't be that hard since you're using the anchors.  Perhaps a ratcheting mechanism would work better (like the tie downs for a pick up).  My other gripe is the recline (or lack of recline).  The 2 provided positions are both too straight up... whenever my baby falls asleep in the car his head falls forward in a very uncomfortable looking position.  It seems this would be resolved with a better recline.  Almost makes me feel like they didn't have parents test this before they started selling them.  Given the chance i'd pass on this one and get something that A) has a better recline for sleeping babies and B) is easier to install snug and tight
This car seat is seriously the most thin, least protection car seat there is. Do not recommend for small kids.

Special Features: Car seat and suitcase sold separately
Review: We used this on a trip to Disney we took. I was a bit nervous taking a car seat on the airplane due to lugging it and two kids around the airport. This product really was easy to use and so handy! Strapped right on my carry on roller bag. With a toddler a car seat makes the flight so much better. He actually fell asleep!!! I was able to READ a BOOK!!! I never thought that would happen with two under 4.

Bought this carseat for my third child. She is now 6 weeks old and I'm happy to report, it has worked perfect for us. I noticed a lot of complaints about the lack of head support but if this is properly installed, it lays back enough that they don't really need additional head support. This is the first time I didn't feel it necessary to hold my newborn's head up the whole way home from the hospital. The fabric is a little scratchy but the baby doesn't seem to mind. There are mornings she's in it for two hours while I run the other kids around town and she sleeps peacefully the whole time. The biggest plus to this seat is the fact that it's so lightweight.
My 7 year old loves this ~ long car rides ~ very comfy

Special Features: Online Chat: Chat with our ParentLink customer service experts online in real time, Live Video Installation Support: Schedule an appointment to have a certified car seat safety technician guide you through a proper vehicle installation
Review: This is my second one. I loveee it . I have one for my 3 yr old and he loves car rides now

Special Features: Online Chat via ParentLink, Live Video Installation Support, EasyClick LATCH
Review: We bought this for our granddaughter. We looked particularly to work at multiple ages. It is very heavy so don't get this one if you intend to carry the baby in it.

I love Britax products! I feel comfortable traveling with my daughter in the car knowing she's secure with this car seat. Easy to install in your car as well as adjust the seats positioning. And best of all its easy to take your child in and out with the safety belts fasteners. Definitely recommend!

Just got this car seat, so can’t really say how it will work out over time. It feels well-made, and very solid, and we like the material (we got the Thunder one). Unfortunately, I didn’t buy the “mat thingy” Clek also makes right away,. In my car (2016 Tesla Model S), the only viable position for this seat is the center, and that means there are only seatbelts, no LATCH hooks. In order to get a secure fit, I keep on tightening the seat belt until it moved by less than 1” - as the directions indicated. Three days later, I took the seat back out of the car, and my leather seats had some pretty severe indentations from the underside of the seat.

I really don’t understand why the base of the car seat would do that to a car. This is why I’m subtracting a star. Either don’t damage my car, or include the mat thingy in the price.
best car seat we have ever had
Very difficult to install rear facing. Have tried multiple cars and it will not get tight enough. Hoping once my grandson gets old enough to forward face we will be able to use the car seat.

Special Features: Super Easy, Car Rental inflatable packable portable luggage travel
Review: It still is a little bulky when deflated but it’s comfy. My daughter likes it.
Great product
Easy to use

Special Features: Removable Tray, Safety Harness, Folds for Easy Transport and Storage
Review: I guess when I bought this the first time, we didn't really use it as a high chair. As a booster, pulled up to the table, it's fine. Worked for my son well. I would give it 4/5. As a high chair, this time around (we just purchased a new one), it really is awful. The blue dye from the stamp has run and is all over the tray. Every time I try to wipe it, more shows up on the towel. I guess we will have to try to remove the entire stamp with alcohol. A lot of work. Have no idea how toxic this stuff is. Additionally, the middle strap does not come out and is filthy, making the the thing hard to clean adequately. The tray is hard to put on and remove. I'm inclined to just buy something else, given the price tag, since my baby is not ready to join us at the table. They really ought to rethink the design! A waste of money!

Your directions were way off.  Biggest booklet I have ever gotten and didn't tell me a thing.  Was ready to send it back but decided to try You Tube video and was finally able to figure this out.  Cup holders, however, are crappy and never did get the cup holders in.  Ended up throwing them aside.  Maybe a You Tube video can show me how, but I just don't think they are made correctly.  Lucky for you I didn't buy this for the cup holders and the fact that this is just for Grandmas car and not for everyday use.
Just perfect

This booster seat is perfect for travelling. I hate using the gross booster seats at the rental car stores, this allows me to bring my own. It is super portable and slim to carry. I think it's a great idea! Can't wait to use this on my next vacation post pandemic.
Love this car seat. I used from infant to toddler. The car seat is heavy and bulky but I rarely remove it so no problems. Great price at Amazon.

I received the Car Seat and it has a manufacturing date of 9-5-17. That is a whole year lost off the amount of time I have to use this before the expiration date because our baby is due in October. This is unacceptable.
This set is adorable and so easy to use!

Special Features: Machine Washable Seat Pad, LATCH Compatible, Forward Facing Seat
Review: Safe, nice and easy to install

As a Mother of 2 and a physician, I value the safety of my child's carseat above many other aspects of it.  It is the current recommendations of the AAP to keep kids in the full 5 point harness as long as possible.  When my tall 3 year-old (42") out grew his Britax Boulevard I started searching for a 5 point replacement.  The Graco Nautilus met all of my requirements (saftey, comfort, & easy to clean) and was one of the most reasonably priced of the seats.  It was easy to install in both my Tahoe and my Prius (took less than 10 min to get it done).  It tightened down so well that it doesn't wiggle at all.  (I actually used both the latch and the seatbelt to secure it since the latch system has a lower weight limit than the 5 point harness on the seat but it was unmoving with just the latch).  This is one of the first seats I have not needed to have the local fire department install in order to have it completely correct.  I was able to tighten out all of the wiggle myself.  It was also easy to adjust for my child's height (with a lot of room to grow despite him being tall).  It has 2 positions for the buckle strap so I was able to move it out and not let my son's genital area be uncomfortable from a tight strap.  My son loves it.  He actually asked to go extra places for the first few weeks because he liked riding in it so much.  We have taken a 9 hour car trip with out a single complaint of being uncomfortable.  My son likes the extra cubbies to hide snacks or toys and the drink holder works well to hold a sippy cup or water bottle.  Unlike most other car seats, he is unable to unclick himself because of the design of the buckle.  The material is easy to wipe down and the cover can be removed and washed if needed.  I haven't found a negative in the first few months and 2 thousand miles of use.
Very comfortabel & sturdy, the kid really loves it. Good buy, 5 stars, FYI: He sleeps comfortably on it everytime.

My now 5 year old has been in this seat since he was 4 months old. He was rear facing until about 2 1/2 and had no issues as far as leg room. He would just fling them over the side or prop them up. Now at 5 years we are still using the 5 point harness forward facing but I am thinking soon we will move on to using as a booster. He is about 39.5 lbs and 43 inches. This is his favorite seat, he tells me all the time how much more comfortable it is than the seat in my husbands car and MIL’s car. He likes that this one is big enough for him to pull his feet up and sit criss cross applesauce. He has spilled, puked, pooped and whatever else you can think of in this seat as all kids do. It is so easy to remove the cover and throw in the wash and then just spray down the frame/base. You don’t even have to remove the entire seat to get the cover off. It’s no harder than any other seat to install. It just takes some elbow grease to get it tight. Sometimes I’ll sit in it and have my husband pull the straps. We love this seat and highly recommend it.
Convenient in size for traveling purposes but realistically the product does not seem safe. The flimsy strap that is behind the child does not stay up like mentioned and demonstrated in video.

We originally ordered this and was pleased with the quality.  Unfortunately, this was too big for our vehicle; we had to adjust our front seats too far forward for comfort and safety.  Might be better suited for a minivan or something similar.
I love this car seat. I researched it and many others and chose this one.  Amazon had the best price!!!  It is big and sturdy and is perfect for my growing granddaughter. Thanks!!!
Obviously not as comfortable as the regular car seat, but this one inflates quickly, and works well for travel. Used it in Uber for my 7 year old. Very compact when deflated.
Good car seat. We were looking for something without spending too much money. I’ve had it for over a year and it has done well.
good

After using the click tight feature I can't imagine using another car seat. It really puts my mind at ease to hear the "click" when I tighten or loosen the straps because I know the fit is appropriate and my little ones are safe. Kids grow fast, and sometimes sweaters, pants, etc. are thicker than other clothing items worn the day before so you do adjust the straps to keep your child comfortable and safe more than you think. I'm frugal, but spend the extra money on the convenient click tight feature, you won't regret it. Another HUGE perk of this car seat is how easy it is to transfer from one car to another. We did not want to buy car seats for my husbands car (because we have two under two) and it is pain free process moving them often. This is a great car seat!!

We absolutely love this car seat! Our daughter rides so well in it. The material is soft and durable. The seat itself is extremely well made. We have used other car seats as a backup when riding in another vehicle and not only are they difficult to use, but our daughter does not ride well in them. This seat is amazing. You can tell she is well protected and comfortable. It is easy to keep clean. Installation is a breeze. Most importantly, I feel secure that she will be safe in the event of an accident. It is worth every penny. We are expecting baby number two in a few weeks and actually just purchased a second one for him to use when he gets bigger. We love our Peg Perego products and will continue to buy them for a long time.
Great seat.  Just bought another.

First, make sure your seat belt is squared not circled. Some of these were recalled. The 2nd one I got had no recall.

Everything is mostly awesome except in a smaller car it's definitely a 2 person job to install. In a larger one it still probably is but it goes much faster.

Downsides:
-Need to remove seat to adjust seatbelt
-Some of these have recalls.
-relatively difficult to install, especially with small vehicles or if you need to use a noodle to keep it level

In my opinion, worth the money

We went on a trip and rented a car seat.  It happened to be this one.  After we got home and started to use our original one we decided we had to buy this one.  My son is a big 3.  He is already wearing 5-6 size clothing so that tells you how  big he is.  This seat fits him so much better and he still has room to grow.  I like that it transitions into a booster and still provides head protection.
Súper segura, fácil de adaptar al auto. Y de muy buena calidad

I am a huge fan of Britax and their car seats. The clicktight is a bit tricky sometimes especially if your like me and don't ever read manuals and just figure " I know what I'm doing". It's not that hard, but just reading the basics on how to install helps a lot. It is a heavy seat, more heavy than most brands.

Pros:
Easy ish install-makes transferring from vehicle to vehicle easy
Different positions available to make RF to FF more simple
No rethreading the buckles when your child hits a growth spurt,just press a button and pull the top part up( I can't express enough how much this will make your lives easier, rethreading the buckles are a hassle because you have to take the cover off etc.)

Cons:
If the seatbelt is tethered too tight it can be hard to push the seat down and lock it, some rethreading maybe necessary in the first few time before you get your feel

Sometimes the seat leans to one side no matter how many time I reposition the seat and reinstall, it's not a huge safety concern, but I am planning an appt with a car seat tech to see if I am doing anything wrong.

The cup holder attachment is difficult, I still haven't figured it out yet.

All and all it is a great seat. Although I have not installed the seat using the tethers and have only done the seatbelt install I am very satisfied with the seat overall.

Special Features: Includes LATCH connectors that attach to vehicle, keeping the booster seat secure when not in use., The backrest on the Viaggio HBB 120 can be removed for easier travel and transport.
Review: Amazing quality. Love the recline feature. Fits nicely on narrower seats. Perfect in Tesla Model Y! Very happy with it.

THIS BOOSTER SEAT SAYS FOR 30-100 POUNDS. When the box arrived it says 40-100 pounds. Upon further research this is not for children under 40 pounds. I bought this for a child that has a medical issue and cant wear the traditional five point harness. We believed that this would be safe for her. Unfortunately, it not as she is only 30 pounds. We will be unable to use this for an long period of time.

The seat itself looks and feels just like any other booster seat I have seen. It does latch into the car making it more stable than other booster seats.

The only thing i dislikes was installing it. Hard to tighten completely.I found taking off the lower part of the cover where the adjust buckle then pulling through frame to tighten while pushing down in the chair helped. Once installed good to go. Put cover back over
Bought 2 for my kids!!! They love them,  and they were super easy to install.  They're really sturdy and I feel like out of all the carseats we've looked at, these are the best!!
Installs well. Seems solid.

After using this for 5 mos, I broke down and bought a Graco 35 Click Connect. Even if I only use it for a few more months with our baby, it is better than feeling like my arms are going to snap off and my shins getting bruises. The 40 is so cumbersome and unwieldy it's not worth it. It sounds good it theory but you are NOT going to want to lug around your child in a carrier when they're reaching the max limits of this. Our baby is 15 lbs and the carrier alone is almost 10. I found myself making up excuses to not run errands and get out with her as much because carrying her in this is so exhausting. It takes up an entire shopping cart if you set them in one. Also, it just takes up more room in general anywhere you go. I jokingly call it the "Spruce Goose" because it is comically large and over the top. You are not going to save any money by trying to stretch the time until you have to get "big kid" car seat. You're better off getting a click connect or classic connect because they are more versatile. The 40 will ONLY fit with the 40 base and won't connect on any of the strollers,etc.
Nice car seat.  I don't like that you can see the foam inserts from the side view.  They should be hidden be hide the fabric, but it's not possible.
Son loves it & it seems like it's extremely comfy
This is our second Britax car set. Our daughter outgrew her old one. No complaints on the booster version. Our daughter loves the floral print.
Missing the strap that hooks into the car....so basically, we can't use this.

The morons that made this car seat never tested it in the majority of cars. The strap is about an inch or two too short to be able to get it connected to the seat. I'm sure they tested it on one car and it fit in and they called it a day. I have attempted to install it into 4 different cars. In 3 of those cars it was an infuriating awful experience and I eventually got it in. The 4th car it was impossible. The only way to get the car seat in would be to have the bubble meter outside the safe zone. So I have to choose between my kid being safe and getting the stupid car seat in. ONE FREAKING INCH! Graco please read this and make the strap ONE FREAKING INCH LONGER!!!!! I can't believe how incompetent the testing team is.
Very good. I have it for 3 years and no complain about it. My wife and I , we like it. A good buy.
Absolutely love this car seat, easy to install, comftertable for my little one, and doesn't take up too much space. Also easy to clean too.

Awful, just awful. I used this as a rear facing seat and I'm currently looking for a new one. 1.) it's hard to make this secure in rear facing 2.) the shoulder straps hard hard to tighten and loosen 3.) it feels very flimsy and not secure.
Easy to assemble and use.
Just an all around great car seat. My 4 year old is comfortable, it’s easy to buckle, easy to install, and has a sturdy cup holder. Worth the money which is a great deal btw.

I give 4 stars because it doesn't fit well in my car. It is really big. I have a Ford Fusion and I am using it rear facing. It moves when I make a turn. My daughter seems to like it so it is comfy. Hopefully will be better when it is forward facing.

Used it for our vacation where we had to get a rental car. My daughter loved it and said it made her feel like a big girl. Very easy to set up and easy to get them in and out of.
Wouldn’t recommend for daily usage, but great if someone without a car seat has to take the kids somewhere.
Arrived clearly having been opened and returned.  It was missing the instruction manual and back cover.  Extremely irritating.
I love how this fits in the backseat of my minivan! It's just thin enough to get three booster back there- FINALLY!
This is the third convertible car seat that I have installed and used.  This is by far the easiest to install and adjust as my baby has grown.
Love this car seat- this is the 2nd one I've bought (one for my son and now one for my daughter). Easy to install and easy to buckle the kiddos in. They love their seats too!
What a great carseat!  This and the Chico keyfit30 are the 2 best on the market.
exactly as pictured. was nervous, bc it was on the cheaper end, that it would be flimsy but it’s a nice solid car seat. happy i took a chance.
Exactly what I needed
We love this car seat!  I love how you do not have to adjust the seatbelt straps, you just raise the handle to make it taller for your baby!  Should have bought this carseat a while back!

First and foremost: I am a former CPST & a mom of 3. We travel by air and I've installed in a LOT of cars.

1. This seat is AMAZING for extended rear facing. You can easily rear face a child to age 4, possibly longer. My oldest is 5 and still fits rear facing at 44inches and 43lbs.

2. This seat is compact. Front to back it is more compact than a Chicco Nextfit, Britax CT, Diono with angle adjuster, and Clek Foonf. I am 5ft 11inchs, this seat is the most comfortable in sedans and behind the driver.

3. This seat allows for the vehicle seat to touch it.

4. This seat has a very broad range for acceptable angles. It can be more upright or more reclined. This is great when rear facing in small spaces.

5. The fabric as held up over the years. No snags. Minimal fading. And it's stayed clean. Easy to wash. The only wear is a little pilling on the harness straps.

6. The forward facing install with a seatbelt can be a little annoying but not difficult at all.

7. Not bad for a 3 across situation.

8. Peg does not require a replacement after ANY crash. Only after certian criteria. So if you bump a mailbox at 3mph and scratch your bumper, you wont be required to replace like major brands require.

There are trendy seats, like the rava and the foonf. I've had both. (I have 9 car seats.) But out of all of my years (8) this is the one seat I've never resold, traded, or replaced. It's stayed in our rotation and as soon as it expired another was purchased.

We bought one and were really happy with it so we bought another for the truck.

Pros:
Very sturdy and easy to adjust
Offers some recline even in the back seat of my f150 (the back seats are for children and are completely vertical)
The kid sleeps well. None of that head hung over broken neck look they get with the straight seats.

Cons:
Does not face the rear, so you have to wait a little longer to transition from the infant carrier.
The waste seat belts have no lower limit so you have to dig them out from under your kid every time.
The cup holder and so called storage spots(open areas under the arm rests) are not removable so you need to vacuum them out or remove the car seat and shake it out
The upper quick mount has a minimum distance of about 6 inches which is fine for the car but my truck needed about 2 inches
I love this car seat for my three year old! The cup holders are super useful as well!
Cute! My girl loves it.
Great car seat!  I found base to be secure and love the adjustable headrest feature.
My kid loves it!
This seat seats to be comfortable, is very easy to assemble and install. My chold seems to like it and fits good. We picked the purple/black color.

Seat was easy to install. Is a little large but great for people with an SUV. Our son who was  9 months old at time of purchase absolutely loves it. He doesnt fuss anymore in the car. It is very cushioned and cozy. I am definitely buying a second one for the grandparents car.
Very happy with this car seat. Was a great deal on amazon. I am thinking of ordering one more so I can take all the kids I watch out for fun adventures this summer.

We have always loved Recaro car seats.  We've owned 3 over the years.  We needed to replace them and after reading reviews felt good about this seat.  It is SO nice.  We briefly owned the Britax click tight and this reminds me so much of it - the fabric, style, shape, and size.  It feels so nice, seems to be very comfortable, and it's really pretty too.  I'm so impressed at the value of this carseat and would highly recommend it.

I love my britax. I just do not like the new covers they have made. The fabric can not be put into the washing machine, however spot treating it is not removing the stains. The seat material stains VERY easily, which when you have a toddler is not ideal. It's not just food stains. It is also stains from shoes, etc. I wish they kept the fabric from their previous model. I have NO stains on that seat but needed to get rid of it due to a car accident. Love the pattern though.
Love it

Finding a car seat with a harness belt that will work with larger kids is tough, especially in the low price range. This provides that added safety and the seat is approved for 10 years of use. That's especially good because it converts to a booster that a kid can use it until they are 100 lb or 52 inches (4 feet 4 inches) tall.

We purchased this Britax seat for my youngest (age 5) who was ready to get out of his Britax car seat.  We have been a Britax family since day one with my oldest (who is now 11).  I really like this seat, especially the belt positioners (both over the shoulder and across the lap). My only complaint is it's semi-annoying to take out of the car because it doesn't stay together as a seat (it doesn't seem to lock in the seat position), but that's clearly not a big hindrance. So far it's worked well for us!

Writing a review now that I have used for awhile. EXTREMELY disappointed with this product. I had to go find a hard styrofoam piece to fit snug under the unit to help recline otherwise my kids head would fall, complete design flaw. I went to switch the unit recently to Front Face and was unsuccessful due to the straps being too short to connect that direction. I wish I would have returned! Not Happy!

This product has very glaring built in flaw but that is not what irks me, it is the callous attitude of their Customer Service in trying to justify that flaw as an integral design feature. The idea behind the product is exemplary but executions is far from lacking. The sliding arm at the bottom of won't lock in place after it has been set per childs requirement, once the child is retrained the slider, even with slightest nudge will go back to position ZERO thereby completely locking the child and were that to happen, to unfasten is a nightmare. But the attitude & callousness of their customer service makes me wonder if this company should even be in child safety business.

UPDATE: September 17th 2017

My earlier review was diligently followed up by Mi-Folds management. The CEO himself wrote to my friend and was on top of the situation. That in itself deserves 5 star. The new replacement works just as it should. Overall very happy both with the product & with the excellent customer service.
Love it

This is a very good car seat. The color and pattern are gorgeous the material is extremely soft and cushiony. The only problem is it is a little confusing to adjust when your child gets older. Very Happy overall.
do not order this item! it is flimsy plastic and not safe!

Great idea and good quality but not very comfortable and kind of a pain to put it on and buckle your child in. I bought this for travel overseas, but once I got there I ended up buying a $10 plastic booster that was much easier to buckle and more comfortable for my 6 year old. I have not used it since but I guess its okay to have around the house for short taxi/uber rides and for occasional guest pick up. But be sure to practice enough times beforehand to have figured it out well before calling uber.

Special Features: Machine Washable Seat Pad, LATCH Compatible, Forward Facing Seat
Review: Great product.
My 1 year old loves this car seat, so roomy and comfortable...

Not only do the instructions note to use a 'pool noodle' as part of the installation instructions.  It also has a VERY poor anchor system to prevent the seat from moving in a rear end accident.  I can see how this would be a good seat (for the money) for a front facing child and I like the cup holder.  I will be putting back in the box until he's big enough to face front.

My 3 & 4 year olds absolutely love their new "big boy" seats with their own cup holders.  The seat gives a really nice support system using the in car seat belts.  The head, neck and shoulders are all supported nicely.  I would absolutely recommend this item to someone who is ready to upgrade from the baby seats.

The anchor straps are very difficult to adjust and seem to loosen constantly. I cannot get my son’s seat tight enough to keep it from moving around on the seat. I’ve tried and tried, now purchasing a different seat for him. After reading the reviews, seems I’m definitely not the only one with this problem.

Top quality and brand. The brand speaks for its self and this car seat it fantastic. It’s not to heavy and VERY easy to install. I would highly recommend this car seat for when your need to move from the moveable car seat to a fixed car seat.

Great buy.
Great size and loving the cup holder.

Overall I love this seat! So safe and sturdy. Only small issue I had was installing it - its hard!! But once you get it tightened that car seat isn't budging! We are a britax only family. Have 4 of them!
Love this seat!  We have been using it for about three months and my son loves it too. I feel that it's very comfortable and I love that the cover is easy to take off and wash if need be.

I'm also posting a review about the stroller/wheels you can buy for this thing, which I do not recommend.

My baby is 3 1/2 months as of this review.
